node.title: Only 2000 week passes left

node.title: Darkside to play Øya Saturday 9th of August
node.excerpt: The album Pshycic got very good reviews and made several important album-of-the-year-lists.

node.title: Slowdive to play Øya on Saturday 9th of August
node.excerpt: The band’s plan is to visit a few selected festivals in 2014, and we are proud that Øya is one of them

node.title: The National, Blood Orange and King Midas to play Øya
node.excerpt: 60 % of the week passes are sold

node.title: Janelle Monáe at Øya 7th of August
Queens Of The Stone Age to headline Øya on August 6th
node.excerpt: The most consistent hard rock band so far this century

node.title: Röyksopp & Robyn together on stage Friday 8th of August
Øya 2013 – the best ever!
node.excerpt: Øya Festival 2013 is over. During four days in The Medieval Park and an enormous amount of club shows in the city centre, several thousand people enjoyed good music. The concerts were well attended by curious music lovers. Even the more unknown acts in the line-up, drew a good crowd. It has been a wonderful festival – from the […]

node.title: Øya 2013 is sold out
node.excerpt: For the twelfth year in a row Øya festival have sold out all kinds of tickets to The Medieval Park, in advance. We’re putting the final touches on the festival site and look forward to opening the gates on Wednesday. Now we look forward to a city full of packed club shows tomorrow, followed by […]

messages.404.title: Hmm, den siden fant vi ikke (404)
messages.errorboundary.desc: Vi setter utrolig stor pris på om du vil hjelpe oss med å rapportere feilen, slik at vi kan få fikset den så fort som mulig. Tusen takk!
messages.errorboundary.title: Beklager, noe gikk galt
messages.gallery.flicker: Se alle bilder fra {year} på flickr
messages.newsletter.consentText: Øyafestivalen sender ut nyhetsbrev cirka 3-4 ganger per måned via e-post. Make AS er databehandler for nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen lagres i en egen database, deles ikke med andre og slettes når du sier opp abonnementet ved å melde deg av via lenken nederst i nyhetsbrevet. E-postadressen slettes også om vi får tilbakemelding om at den ikke er aktiv.
messages.newsletter.title: Meld deg på nyhetsbrevet
